Package no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.ui

Class AuditWindow

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.ui.AuditWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget, ViolationListener
public class AuditWindow extends javafx.stage.Stage implements ViolationListener
Represents a GUI Window responsible for displaying linter violations. This is the main window for the Linter extensions. Listens to the ViolationListener, and updates the GUI when violations change.
